original_text: When anyone asks you for something, give it to him. Someone may take something that belongs to you. If he does, let him keep it. Do not ask to have it back again.
korean_text: 네게 구하는 자에게 주며 네 것을 가져가는 자에게 다시 달라 하지 말며

sentences.original_text: When anyone asks you for something
Someone may take something that belongs to you
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 너의 것을 가져갈 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: Do not ask to have it back again
